ResistanceFeature.Name: Angelic Protection
ResistanceFeature.Text: The innate resistance to magic that angels possess extends to you. You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MultiFeature.Name: Dao Heritage
MultiFeature.Text: You manifest more of the magical power of your dao heritage. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You learn the detect magic spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. • You gain natural armor. While you aren’t wearing armor, you can calculate your AC as 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Strength
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Constitution
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Dao Heritage
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn the detect magic spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot.

ACFeature.Name: Dao Heritage
ACFeature.Text: You gain natural armor. While you aren’t wearing armor, you can calculate your AC as 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Djinn Heritage
MultiFeature.Text: You manifest more of the magical power of your djinn heritage. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Dexterity or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You learn the detect magic spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. • You have resistance to lightning and thunder damage.

MultiFeature.Name: Efreet Heritage
MultiFeature.Text: You manifest more of the magical power of your efreet heritage. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Constitution or Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You learn the detect magic spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. • Your darkvision has a radius of 120 feet.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution or Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

VisionFeature.Name: Efreet Heritage

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Feline Grace
MultiFeature.Text: Your incredible reflexes and agility further improve. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You can use your Feline Agility trait twice before you must move 0 feet on one of your turns to use the trait again. You can still only use this ability once per turn when you move. • You don’t take damage from falling 20 feet or less if you aren’t incapacitated.

ResourceFeature.Name: Feline Grace
ResourceFeature.Text: You can use your Feline Agility trait twice before you must move 0 feet on one of your turns to use the trait again. You can still only use this ability once per turn when you move.

Feature.Name: Feline Grace
Feature.Text: You don’t take damage from falling 20 feet or less if you aren’t incapacitated.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Firbolg Beast Magic
MultiFeature.Text: Your connection to animals deepens. You learn the speak with animals spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn the animal friendship and beast sense spells, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast these two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for all three spells.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Firbolg Beast Magic
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn the speak with animals spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Firbolg Beast Magic
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn the animal friendship spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast this spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Firbolg Beast Magic
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn the beast sense spell and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast this spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Like a Boss
MultiFeature.Text: You are accustomed to using others to avoid being attacked. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • When a creature you can see targets you with an attack and another creature is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. Once you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

ResourceFeature.Name: Like a Boss
ResourceFeature.Text: When a creature you can see targets you with an attack and another creature is within 5 feet of you, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll. Once you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Marid Heritage
MultiFeature.Text: You manifest more of the magical power of your marid heritage. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You learn the detect magic spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot. • You have resistance to cold damage.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Constitution
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Wisdom
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Marid Heritage
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn the detect magic spell and can cast it at will, without expending a spell slot.

ResistanceFeature.Name: Marid Heritage
ResistanceFeature.Text: You have resistance to cold damage.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Master of Mimicry
MultiFeature.Text: You have learned to temporarily mimic even the training of others. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Dexterity or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • Whenever another creature you can see uses a skill or tool, you can use your reaction to gain proficiency in that skill or tool. Proficiencies gained in this way last for 1 hour, and you can only mimic one proficiency at a time. Once you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Dexterity or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Dexterity
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Wisdom
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

ResourceFeature.Name: Master of Mimicry
ResourceFeature.Text: Whenever another creature you can see uses a skill or tool, you can use your reaction to gain proficiency in that skill or tool. Proficiencies gained in this way last for 1 hour, and you can only mimic one proficiency at a time. Once you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Mountain's Endurance
MultiFeature.Text: Your ability to shrug off some injuries is legendary, even for your race. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • When you use your Stone’s Endurance trait as a reaction to reduce damage, instead of rolling a d12 and adding your Constitution modifier, you can choose to gain resistance to the triggering attack’s damage type until the start of your next turn. If the triggering attack deals more than one type of damage, choose one. As normal, after you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Strength
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Constitution
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

ResourceFeature.Name: Mountain's Endurance
ResourceFeature.Text: When you use your Stone’s Endurance trait as a reaction to reduce damage, instead of rolling a d12 and adding your Constitution modifier, you can choose to gain resistance to the triggering attack’s damage type until the start of your next turn. If the triggering attack deals more than one type of damage, choose one. As normal, after you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Serpent Form
MultiFeature.Text: You have unlocked more of your serpentfolk heritage. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Intelligence or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You can use an action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into your true form. Your statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment you are wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. If you die, you stay in your current form. • While in snake form, you gain a bite attack as a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike. When you hit with a bite attack, you can choose to deal 2d6 additional poison damage to the target. Once you deal this poison damage, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Intelligence or Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Intelligence
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Charisma
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Charisma score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

Feature.Name: Serpent Form
Feature.Text: You can use an action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into your true form. Your statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment you are wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. If you die, you stay in your current form.

ResourceFeature.Name: Serpent Form
ResourceFeature.Text: While in snake form, you gain a bite attack as a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike. When you hit with a bite attack, you can choose to deal 2d6 additional poison damage to the target. Once you deal this poison damage, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Sky Warden
MultiFeature.Text: You are trained for both scouting the skies and aerial combat. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Dexterity or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You gain proficiency in the Perception skill if you don’t already have it. You add double your proficiency bonus to Perception checks that rely on sight. • Once per turn, if you are flying and dive at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 1d6 damage to the target.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Dexterity or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Dexterity
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Wisdom
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

SkillProficiencyFeature.Name: Sky Warden
SkillProficiencyFeature.Text: You gain proficiency in the Perception skill if you don’t already have it. You add double your proficiency bonus to Perception checks that rely on sight.

Feature.Name: Sky Warden
Feature.Text: Once per turn, if you are flying and dive at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 1d6 damage to the target.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Tanarukk Blood
MultiFeature.Text: Through fell magic or an ancestor, you are touched by the corruptive power of Baphomet. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You have resistance to fire and poison damage. • You gain a bite attack as a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Strength or Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Strength
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Constitution
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

ResistanceFeature.Name: Tanarukk Blood
ResistanceFeature.Text: You have resistance to fire and poison damage.

BonusFeature.Name: Tanarukk Blood
BonusFeature.Text: You gain a bite attack as a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Tortle Protector
MultiFeature.Text: You have mastered using your shell to better protect yourself and others. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Strength or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • Your natural armor trait now provides a base AC of 18. As normal, your Dexterity modifier doesn’t affect this number. • As a reaction when you are forced to make a Dexterity saving throw, choose any number of creatures within 5 feet of you. Each chosen creature is considered to have half-cover against any harmful attacks or effects while within 5 feet of you until the start of your next turn. Once you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you’ve finished a short or long rest.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Strength or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Strength
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Wisdom
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

ACFeature.Text: Your natural armor trait now provides a base AC of 18. As normal, your Dexterity modifier doesn’t affect this number.

ResourceFeature.Name: Tortle Protector
ResourceFeature.Text: As a reaction when you are forced to make a Dexterity saving throw, choose any number of creatures within 5 feet of you. Each chosen creature is considered to have half-cover against any harmful attacks or effects while within 5 feet of you until the start of your next turn. Once you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you’ve finished a short or long rest.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Touch of Sess'inek
MultiFeature.Text: You embody the demonic bearing of a lizard king or queen. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You learn to speak, read, and write Abyssal. • You are immune to being frightened.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Constitution
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Wisdom

ResistanceFeature.Name: Touch of Sess'inek
ResistanceFeature.Text: You are immune to being frightened.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Triton Deep Magic
MultiFeature.Text: You master more of the magic of elemental air and water. You learn the create or destroy water spell and can cast it as a 1st level spell at will, without expending a spell slot. You also learn warding wind and water breathing, each of which you can cast once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast those two spells in this way when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for all three spells.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Triton Deep Magic
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn the create or destroy water spell and can cast it as a 1st level spell at will, without expending a spell slot. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Triton Deep Magic
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn warding wind and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast this spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Triton Deep Magic
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You learn water breathing and can cast it once without expending a spell slot. You regain the ability to cast this spell in this way when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Uphold the Legion
MultiFeature.Text: You were born for life in the legion. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Constitution or Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You can deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally that isn’t incapacitated. You can use this trait only once per combat. • You can extend the benefit of your Saving Face trait to an ally. As a reaction, if an ally misses with an attack roll or fails an ability check or a saving throw, you can grant a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies your ally can see within 30 feet (including you, maximum bonus of +5). As normal, once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution or Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Constitution
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Intelligence
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Intelligence score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

Feature.Name: Uphold the Legion
Feature.Text: You can deal an extra 2d6 damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally that isn’t incapacitated. You can use this trait only once per combat.

ResourceFeature.Name: Uphold the Legion
ResourceFeature.Text: You can extend the benefit of your Saving Face trait to an ally. As a reaction, if an ally misses with an attack roll or fails an ability check or a saving throw, you can grant a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies your ally can see within 30 feet (including you, maximum bonus of +5). As normal, once you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Urd Wings
MultiFeature.Text: You manifest leathery wings, transforming into an urd. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • You gain a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

Feature.Name: Urd Wings
Feature.Text: You gain a flying speed of 30 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

MultiFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

MultiFeature.Name: Well Rested
MultiFeature.Text: Your practiced napping leaves you invigorated when you are awake. You gain the following benefits: • Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20. • Whenever you spend one or more hit dice during a short rest, you can regain an extra 1d6 hit points. • At the end of a long rest, you gain inspiration (described in chapter 4 of the Player’s Handbook).

ChoiceFeature.Name: Ability Score Increase
ChoiceFeature.Text: Increase your Strength or Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Strength
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Strength score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

AbilityScoreFeature.Name: Dexterity
AbilityScoreFeature.Text: Increase your Dexterity score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

ChoiceFeature.Source: Xanathar’s Guide To Everything Bonus Expanded Racial Feats

Feature.Name: Well Rested
Feature.Text: Whenever you spend one or more hit dice during a short rest, you can regain an extra 1d6 hit points.

Feature.Name: Well Rested
Feature.Text: At the end of a long rest, you gain inspiration.
